content.title: Music and Worship 2003 Conference
content.heading: Music and Worship 2003 Conference
content.p: Calvary Austin invites you to the

intro.p: We are pleased to have songwriter and Calvary Chapel Costa Mesa Worship Pastor Holland Davis as our guest worship leader and speaker for this year's event. A gifted songwriter, musician and teacher, Holland has much to share about leading worship. Before joining the staff of Calvary Chapel Costa Mesa, he was the Director of A&R and Marketing for Maranatha! Music and the creator of the modern worship label Worship Underground. Holland's songs have been recorded on Maranatha! Praise Series recordings, including "Let It Rise", "At the Cross", and "Who is Like the Lord?".

Check-in for the conference will begin at 5:30 PM on Thursday, February 20st; the first session begins at 7:30 PM that evening. The conference is scheduled to end at 12:00 Noon Saturday, February 22rd.

section.heading: Location
section.p: Calvary Austin is located in the northern portion of Austin, Texas, on the northwest corner of Rundberg Lane and Parkfield Drive. Just minutes from the intersection of Texas Hwy 183 and Interstate 35, our facility is 0.2 miles west of the Rundberg/Lamar intersection, and 1.1 miles west of IH 35. Complete contact information is available on our Contact Information page.

section.heading: Registration
section.p: Print out the registration form, fill it out, and mail it, along with your remittance, to Calvary Austin. You'll be pre-registered and your conference materials will be waiting for you when you arrive on February 20! After printing, close the window to return here.

The cost for the conference is $45 per person for registrations received by February 9, 2003. After that date the conference fee will be $55 per person. Meals, lodging and travel expenses are not included in the registration.

This year the registration fee includes 1 conference T-shirt. We are also offering the opportunity to pre-order additional conference T-shirts at $10 each. Indicate the quantity desired on your registration form.
